videos.description: The Barclays crowd is left in awe after James Harden uses a slick no-look bounce pass to hook up with Landry Shamet for a fast-break dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden drops sweet dime to Shamet for the slam) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden drops sweet dime to Shamet for the slam

videos.description: James Harden passes up ahead to Kyrie Irving on the fast break to throw down a dunk that gets the Nets bench fired up and on their feet.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nets bench gets hyped after Kyrie dunk) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nets bench gets hyped after Kyrie dunk

videos.description: Jayson Tatum displays his handles before draining a jumper over Kevin Durant to end the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum finesses buzzer-beater over Durant) 2021/6/1 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum finesses buzzer-beater over Durant

videos.description: Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving knock down back-to-back 3-pointers to help the Nets pull away from the Celtics.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD and Kyrie bury huge 3-pointers for the Nets) 2021/6/1 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD and Kyrie bury huge 3-pointers for the Nets
